definition: thick weeds/luxuriant growth/Illicium anisatum, a shrub with poisonous leaves/impertinent
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Blinking her eyes back to full consciousness, she finds that the two goons have been brutally slain.
sentences.chinese: 她艱難地睜開眼，看到兩個莽漢已被殘忍地殺死了。

sentences.english: But roughs and little children better than they.
sentences.chinese: 莽漢和幼小的孩子們都比他們強。
